UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: A Designed Tryptophan- and Lysine/Arginine-Rich Antimicrobial Peptide with Therapeutic Potential for Clinical Antibiotic-Resistant Candida albicans Vaginitis.
Literature.Author: Jin L, Bai X, Luan N, Yao H, Zhang Z, Liu W, Chen Y, Yan X, Rong M, Lai R, Lu Q

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=>320 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>320 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:3% Hemolysis=320 µg/ml,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:-=NA
